bomberman.core.graphics
Interface GfxObject

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaromDecorator, BombDecorator, BomberDecorator, DynamicBlockDecorator, FireDecorator, MaronDecorator, MinvoDecorator, OnilDecorator, PontanDecorator, PowerUpDecorator
public interface GfxObject

The GfxObject Interface represents the graphics aspect of the PhysicsEntity, it provides some graphics methods inherited from PlayN and delegate the update(int) method to the logic structure.

Author:
Federico Scozzafava
See Also:
PhysicsEntity
